dialogue.speaker: Bob
dialogue.message: I suggest we keep a close eye on each other and report any suspicious behavior. Let's work together to identify and vote for the assassin.

dialogue.message: I agree with Bob's suggestion for close monitoring. Let's all report any unusual activity to ensure a fair game. I'll focus on maintaining a low profile and trust that everyone will do the same.
